text: The Old Fort House, also known as Themerlaine, is a historic mansion in Columbus, Mississippi, U.S.. It was built in 1844 for Elias Fort, a planter, and his wife, Martha Williams Battle. It has been listed on the National Register of Historic Places since October 31, 1985. ==References== Category:Houses on the National Register of Historic Places in Mississippi Category:Greek Revival houses in Mississippi Category:Gothic Revival architecture in Mississippi Category:Italianate architecture in Mississippi Category:Houses completed in 1844 Category:National Register of Historic Places in Lowndes County, Mississippi]
title: Old Fort House (Columbus, Mississippi)
